acceptedAnswer.text: Founded by Devin Finzer and Alex Atallah in 2017, OpenSea is a decentralized marketplace for the purchase and sale of NFTs. Users can buy, collect, trade and gift NFTs on the marketplace. Developers can run an in-app economy with OpenSea.js, run their own marketplace and access the OpenSea API for data on sales, listings, bids and transfers. The platform has one of the lowest commission fees for purchasing and selling NFTs.To date, OpenSea has raised over $427M with their most recent Series C raise capturing $300M from investors including Coatue and Paradigm.

Pantera was founded by former Tiger Management CFO Dan Morehead in 2013 when bitcoin was trading at $65. Pantera is notably the first cryptocurrency fund in the United States in focused exclusively on blockchain technology.Pantera has multiple funds including a venture capital fund and an early stage token fund. Pantera's notable venture investments include the decentralized exchange aggregator 1inch, the Ethereum Layer 2 network Arbitrum, and Coinbase, the leading cryptocurrency exchange in the United States.Some of Pantera's early stage token investments include 0x, Cosmos, Polkadot, PsyOptions, Filecoin, and Livepeer.

Phantom was built by Chris Kalani, Francesco Agosti, and Brandon Millman after brainstorming a Solana-native wallet.Phantom is a non-custodial wallet that is compatible with assets on the Solana blockchain. With Phantom, users can trade, receive, send, and store assets conveniently.It is also compatible with hardware wallets, especially Ledger, for tighter security. Phantom is available on mobile phones and also exists as a browser extension. In May 2023, Phantom launched wallet support for Polygon and Ethereum.

Launched in September 2021, Magic Eden is an NFT marketplace that runs on theSolana blockchain. Users can buy, mint and sell NFTs on the platform. Developerscan use Magic Eden's API to request various endpoints and integrate data intotheir own programmes. Magic Eden has low transaction costs and does not chargecreators for listing NFTs.

Kraken is a United States–based cryptocurrency exchange and bank, founded in2011. Users can invest in cryptocurrency and leverage Kraken's tools andfeatures to grow their portfolio. Developers can use the REST API to connect topublicly endpoints.Kraken was one of the first bitcoin exchanges to be listed on Bloomberg Terminaland is reportedly valued at $10.8 billion USD, as of mid-summer 2022.

Collab Land is a standardized bot for community management and engagement. Thebot can be added to either Telegram or Discord communities.The most unique feature of the Collab Land is that it tracks and only givesmembership access to those who hold your token, automatically kicking out anyonewho sells them.

Stripe's crypto onramp gives crypto businesses like DEXs, NFT Marketplaces, wallets, dApp, and more an easy and fast way for their consumers to purchase crypto. Top web3 companies like MyEtherWallet,, Magic Eden, Audius, and Argent trust Stripe's crypto onramp to give users a seamless experience that is optimized for conversion and instant settlement of crypto. With just 10 lines of code, web3 developers can integrate an onramp that abstracts away all of the complexity of piecing together multiple third-party KYC, payments, fraud, and compliance services. If you’re interested in integrating our onramp, please sign up for the waitlist, and we’ll reach out to you soon.

Alchemy provides the SDK and APIs to build multichain Web3 DApps, and the skillsto use them through a community/university-like initiative.Developers can use the free tools to create smart contracts for multiple usecases and multiple blockchain targets.Alchemy has inspired +$100 Billion worth of transaction value on-chain, withnorth of 10M end users, and royalties upwards of $1,5B.

Backpack is a wallet project built by Coral, the company behind the Anchorframework for Web3 development. It will be the wallet for xNFTs.Backpack will be the gatekeeper for access, transactions, and identitymanagement for the coming xNFT economy. Users will store, send, and collectxNFTs using Backpack across chains and user platforms.

Arweave is a protocol where everyone can host their data without the fear ofcensorship or degradability. The permaweb sits on the Arweave protocol, and ithosts all of the products in the network.Arweave has profit-sharing communities, Ardrive, and Verto.

ZettaBlock provides enterprise-grade, full-stack Web3 infrastructure for indexing and analytics needs, joining real-time on-chain and off-chain data. App developers can build low-latency, reliable GraphQL APIs via SQL and Python in minutes. Users no longer worry about decoding blockchain data, configuring their data warehouses, data pipelines, databases, and API endpoints.

Coinbase wallet is an EVM compatible software wallet, launched in 2018 by thecreators of the Coinbase platform. Users can purchase ERC-20 tokens, NFTs andtake part in airdrops. Developers can use Coinbase wallet to connect directly totestnet faucets in a wallet extension and integrate into dapps and protocols forlending and payment.

Lit can be used to read and write data between blockchains and off-chain platforms, facilitating encryption, access control, and automation for the open web via programmatic signing. On a fundamental level, Lit is an attempt to decentralize public key cryptography. This includes building apps with private data using identity-based encryption, facilitating more seamless onboarding experiences for non-crypto natives with MPC wallets, and more. To learn more, visit [our developer documentation](https://developer.litprotocol.com/).

With the goal of bringing blockchain to a Billion people, the parent companyAlchemy introduced an investment firm called Alchemy ventures.Alchemy ventures is a VC funding empowering developers and communities that arebuilding gaming, metaverse, Defi, or web3 applications using BlockchainTechnology.

Create unlimited DeFi portfolios by bundling wallets across over 40 chains and over 500 protocols! Connect your wallet and get an in-depth view of your DeFi holdings powered by data from Nansen. Gain insights from Nansen's 240 million labeled wallets and comprehensive data analytics.

Coinbase Global, Inc., branded Coinbase, is an American publicly traded companythat operates a cryptocurrency exchange platform. Users can buy, sell, earn,borrow cryptocurrency, use the Coinbase Wallet to store cryptocurrency as wellas collect NFTs and trade derivatives. Developers can access the Coinbase cloudfor developer tools and API.

Andreessen Horowitz (known as "a16z") is a venture capital firm that backs boldentrepreneurs building the future through technology. It was founded in SiliconValley in 2009 by Marc Andreessen and Ben Horowitz. They invest in seed to late-stage technology companies across bio + healthcare,consumer, crypto, enterprise, fintech, games, and companies aspiring to Americandynamism. a16z manages $35 billion in assets across multiple funds.

With a Nametag profile, you can connect multiple wallets across various chains, curate a gallery, and then port that profile into popular apps like Twitter, Youtube, and Discord, as well as metaverses, games, and experiences. Users can interact with our ecosystem through our Chrome extension.

Create Web3 DApp is an npx package that allows developers to create anything from a simple, barebones dApp to a feature-rich decentralized platform, in ~2 minutes. The create-web3-dapp package is a NextJs-based framework, compatible with the most used blockchains including Ethereum, Polygon, Optimism, Arbitrum, Solana, that helps web3 developers build a decentralized production-ready application at lightning speed, using pre-made React components, webhooks, and APIs. For more information, read the create-web3-docs on docs.alchemy.com.

Delphi Digital is an independent research boutique providing institutional-gradeanalysis on the digital asset market.Users can use Delphi’s research to make informed investment decisions abouttheir favorite web3 projects. Industry-leading research insights provide a deeper understanding of criticalconcepts within the crypto ecosystem. Delphi Digital is actually an umbrella company for several entities including aresearch firm, venture firm, and asset creation firm.

Launched in August 2021, Metaplex is one of the largest protocols on Solana. Itenables creators and developers to mint, sell, and manage non-fungible tokens(NFTs). With Metaplex Studio, users can launch customized NFT collectionswithout any coding involved. For developers, Metaplex offers a range of tools and software development kits,including Candy Machine, for minting and distribution, Auction House, forselling, and Token Metadata, for adding NFTs to projects.

Dfns is the most secure wallet-as-a-service platform in web3. Founded in 2020, Dfns is a SOC 2 Type II-certified cybersecurity company that develops a wallet management system, ideal for applications and organizations seeking to provide secure access to all blockchains through a single integration. We support 100+ blockchains and applications.Startups, enterprises and financial institutions use Dfns to create, embed and manage programmable wallets at scale powered by state-of-the-art MPC technology. The product is designed with focus on developer experience to maximize programmability, minimize high-touch implementations, and provide granular sets of permissions, controls and policies to manage transactions via secure authentication credentials (WebAuthn/OTP).

Mirror World is a full-stack Web3 App development platform that means everything from Web2/Web3 login methods to NFT marketplace, wallet integration, and NFT launch are all covered in the SDK with minimal code required. All you need to do is plug in once, integration time is under 30 minutes, and the APIs are all yours. Aside from these primary features, we do have other auxiliary functions such as a UI dashboard, open storefront, data monitoring tools, and so on, to minimize your development effort.

Coinbase ventures support exceptional entrepreneurs, working to advance thecrypto/Web3 ecosystem and Coinbase's mission of increasing global economicfreedom.They work with founding teams from the beginning and invest broadly across allsectors of the crypto economy.They've invested in hundreds of teams that are working on everything from layer1 protocols to Web3 infrastructure, centralized on-ramps, decentralized finance,NFTs, metaverse technologies, developer tooling, and more.

Created by Binance and its U.S. partner BAM Trading Services, Binance.US is acryptocurrency exchange for residents of the United States. Users on theplatform can buy, sell, trade, convert and stake over 120 popularcryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), andCardano (ADA).

HelloMoon.io is a human readable index of Solana. Users can explore all NFTcollections, DeFi tokens, and protocols on the Solana blockchain using the site,as well as connect their wallet to access their portfolio. Developers can usethe API to track on-chain activity. HelloMoon.io labels the wallets that areengaging in each ecosystem.

@graph.headline: Circle Yield - DeFi Yield Farming Platforms

acceptedAnswer.text: USD Coin(USDC) issuer Circle launched its yield program in June 2021 to enableinstitutional investors to earn interest by lending out USDC. Users can deposita minimum of $100,000 USDC, which is lent out to Circle Bermuda. The assets arethen allocated to investment partners who lend it out in the capital cryptomarket. The users receive interest in USDC — the interest rates are updatedweekly and the loan terms range from one to 12 months.

Yawww is an NFT marketplace that is secured by a smart contract written inSolana. Users can collect, buy, trade or collateralize NFTs for loans in apeer-to-peer format. Developers can use the platform to lend money to peers. Onaverage, sellers potentially earn 8% more on an NFTs sold on Yawww than othermarketplaces.

Mobula APIs allow builders to get market & historical data about any crypto asset, wallet transactions, historical balances & swap quotes.Mobula APIs are unified aggregated crypto data APIs. Users can fetch crypto market metrics & meta-data (1,300,000 tokens covered on 17+ blockchains), including historical data starting from 2013, as well as portfolio-related metrics such as ROI, historical balances & transactions from any wallet on 12+ blockchains. On top of that, users can query Mobula Meta-DEX Aggregator to get a unified & ranked price quote from all top DEX aggregators and pick the most optimized one for the end-user. Mobula Labs team provides 24/7 support on Telegram, Discord & Slack for all projects.

Founded in 2021, Hyperspace is a Solana NFT marketplace and aggregator. Userscan view, collect and sell NFTs across Solana marketplaces within the UI.Developers can use theHyperspace API to integrate endpoints into their projects.Hyperspace charges low trading fees and users can see the rarity of their NFT onthe platform.

Zerion is a web3 smart, social wallet, and investing tool that allows anyonewith a mobile phone to manage their DeFi and NFT portfolios, with support forevery chain and thousands of protocols.Users are offered a single point of entry for managing their digital assets,including NFTs, thanks to a relentless focus on user-centered design and atechnology stack that aggregates across every major wallet, network, anddecentralized exchange.Because Zerion is non-custodial, users never delegate their funds to theplatform. This agile approach reduces the risk of centralization and has allowedZerion to operate globally since its inception.

Solflare is a secure and powerful crypto wallet that provides users with all ofthe benefits of Solana. With Solflare users can Buy, send, stake, swap, and trade tokens directly fromtheir phone; use hardware wallets like Ledger, connect to Solana dApps, receiveblockchain notifications, and experience a whole new internet.

Sharing content across the blockchain has typically always been done across public networks. With Submarine, creators can make any content unlockable through NFT ownership, geo-location, and more. Within just a few steps, you determine who gets access to your content, when they can view it, & for how long.

Helius aims to rid the complexity of building on the Solana chain by providingdevelopers APIs for transactions and NFTs, webhooks, and turbocharged RPCs.Developers can build a service that fires notifications or triggers other eventswhen something of effect is registered on the Solana blockchain - such as when aknown collector buys new NFTs.

Messari is the leading provider of crypto market intelligence products that helpprofessionals navigate crypto/Web3 with confidence.Users can utilize Messari products to get the most accurate and up-to-dateinformation about the Web3 industry. Messari Pro offers advanced research and analytics tools for professionalinvestors and Web3 enthusiasts. Messari has the financial backing of some of the most prominent individuals andventure firms in the industry.

Launched by Alex Fleseriu, Exchange Art is an NFT marketplace on the Solanablockchain. Users can search via art categories, participate in auctions, verifytokens and ownership changes on-chain. Developers can list collections and usethe Royalities Protection Standard offered by the platform. Exchange Art alsoallows artists to sell their artworks to a global audience, for a fraction ofthe traditional gallery cost: just 2.5% per sale, compared to the typical50-70%.

Wormhole has a modular architecture that works with other chains as its layers. Wormhole is one of the bridges that connect Solana assets to be useful andinteroperable on other chains, which it often terms to be xChain. Wormhole makes it easier for developers to build both tokens and DApps on across-chain architecture for maximal performance.

The Solana Explorer is a Solana blockchain explorer. Users can use it to viewtransactions, blocks, programs, tokens and accounts across Solana clusters.Developers can use the devnet cluster to enable devloper settings, use thetestnet and test dapps or connect to a custom RPC URL.

Tres Finance gives its users financial workflows such as reconciliation, balance calculation, audit, and reporting for Web3 financials so they can control and manage their transactions and their finance real estate better.Monitoring and managing crypto financial transactions become easier when data is compiled and formatted to fit business benchmarks and KPIs. Tres helps the Web3 world do this more effectively with its special suite of financial tools.

Zellic is a blockchain security and auditing company that aims to provide the best blockchain audits for projects across multiple networks, including Solana, Ethereum, Cosmos, etc. Projects and companies, including Solana Foundation, SushiSwap, Aptos, LayerZero, and many more, rely on Zellic to secure over $3 billion.

Launched in 2021, Solana-based Marinade Finance is a liquid staking platformthat enables users to earn yield on SOL tokens. Users can stake SOL to securethe Solana network and keep it decentralized, and receive marinated SOL or mSOLin return. Users’ mSOL holdings increase as the underlying SOL collects stakingrewards. Marinade users can also use mSOL across the Solana ecosystem and stakethem for additional yield or swap them for SOL at any time. The Marinade ecosystem is governed by a DAO using the MNDE token, which can belocked to mint Chef NFTs that are used to vote. As of November 2022, there areover 450 validators on Marinade's network.

Founded in 2014, Ledger is the global platform for digital assets and web3. Over 20% of the world’s crypto assets are secured through Ledger Nanos. Headquartered in Paris and Vierzon, with offices in London, New-York, Singapore and Portland, Ledger has a team of more than 700 professionals developing a variety of products and services to enable individuals and companies to securely buy, store, swap and manage crypto assets - including the Ledger hardware wallets line with more than 5 million units already sold in more than   180 countries.Ledger combines a hardware wallet: Nano S Plus or Nano X and the Ledger Live app to offer consumers the easiest way to start their crypto journey while maintaining full control over their digital assets. With its ease of use, Ledger allows a user to begin investing in digital assets and ultimately, achieve financial freedom in a safe and stress-free environment, with additional education provided by its Academy. In addition to consumer products, Ledger has also developed Ledger Enterprise, a digital asset custody and security solution for institutional investors and financial players.

Halborn provides blockchain security solutions, including security advisory, advanced penetration testing, smart contract audits, and DevOps and automation services. Halborn was founded in 2019 by renowned ethical hacker Steven Walbroehl and growth hacker Rob Behnke. The company has now grown to over 100 of the world's best offensive security engineers.

With a team of 60+ certified engineers, Hacken provides solutions encompassing all aspects of blockchain security, such as Smart Contract Audit, Blockchain Protocol Audit, dApp Audit, Penetration Testing, and CCSS Audit. Since 2017, Hacken has been raising the bar for blockchain security by contributing to security standards and championing transparency in 1,200+ Web3 projects.

BitGo is an institutional digital asset custody, trading, and financialmanagement service provider.Traders can secure private wallets and custody credentials with BitGo.Developers can bring the functionality of BitGo into their use case applicationsby calling APIs and connecting webhooks from the open-source projects

The Raindrops Protocol is a series of five a la carte contracts that governon-chain or proof-on-chain data specifically for games, allowing any player oritem to be interchangeable with any game client that can process them.The Solana ecosystem has a fragmented and very customized way of storing in-gameassets on-chain, with many different formats. But the Metaplex Protocol'smethods of storing ordinary NFT data are standardized. The aim of Raindrops isto do the same thing for game assets.

Cashmere is a multi-signature wallet on Solana. The wallet's main use to toallow organizations to manage their funds easily. The wallet supports both SOLand all SPL tokens and can integrate with all Solana wallets, hardware orsoftware. Internally, Cashmere’s multi-sig uses a concept called Program DerivedAddresses, which is a program that may be given the authority over an accountand later transfer that authority to another.

Launched in 2019, MoonPay offers a fast and simple way to buy and sellcryptocurrencies. It enables users to purchase and sell cryptocurrencies usingtraditional payment platforms (i.e. Visa, Mastercard, etc.).In its line of products, MoonPay also provides a business payment on-ramp and anNFT payment processor.

Paper enables companies to add Web3 functionality without the confusion of creating a wallet, buying crypto, and signing transactions. It enables your users to buy NFTs with a credit card, create a wallet with an email address, and say goodbye to annoying Metamask popups.

Skiff is an end-to-end encrypted, privacy-first, wallet-native workspace with Mail, Calendar, Pages, and Drive apps. Sign up, pay, and collaborate privately or with your crypto wallet, and store data with end-to-end encryption or decentralized on IPFS.

Made for budding investors, researchers and contributors, Pentacle delivers real-time data on yield opportunities, audits, risk management, integrations, governance, treasuries, team members, jobs, grants and bounties. Using Pentacle, you can zoom in on a project, zoom out to compare – or take a voyage of discovery by following relations mapped through projects, people, skill levels and topics. You can also make a list of favorites, add private notes and trace your browsing history. Thus, Pentacle provides verified information, safe links and helpful learning tools in your crypto quest.

SolanaFM is one of the friendliest blockchain explorer, API, and analytics platforms that provide indexing solutions for Solana, a high-performance and permissionless blockchain. SolanaFM provides equitable access to Solana’s full historical data through efficient and dynamic APIs and showcases on-chain data and analysis. A majority of SolanaFM’s functionality is built using GraphQL. SolanaFM gives developers the autonomy to explore, build & manipulate data as desired.

Kamino Finance automates and optimizes concentrated liquidity management for DEX market makers on Solana. Kamino automatically sets, rebalances, and auto-compounds liquidity positions reducing the barrier to entry for market making on a CLMM. In addition, Kamino makes CLMM positions fungible through kTokens. All users have to do is choose a Kamino vault they feel is right for their portfolio profile and market conditions, deposit funds, and let Kamino take care of the difficult stuff.

Joinlist helps creators get started in seconds with an elegant allowlist page. The Joinlist app makes allowlisting frictionless. Allowing any user to get started for free. Joinlist has worked with over 1,400 projects that include Hashflow, Layer3 and Galxe, powering the next generation of allowlists who care about style and speed.

Tensor makes trading NFTs as fun as trading shit coins. We provide advanced trading features like real-time data (fastest on Solana), full historical candlestick prices, and AMM pools for NFTs. Sweep, bid, list and delist NFTs in bulk. If you're a power user and want access to the fastest platform for NFT trading on Solana, check out Tensor.

Unmarshal provides granular blockchain data through APIs helping developers build dapps faster. Their products include DeFi APIs, NFT/Metaverse APIs, notification services, as well as insights and analytics APIs.

Arbitrary Execution is an engineering-focused organization that specializes in securing decentralized technology. Their team of security researchers leverages their offensive security expertise, tactics, techniques, and hacker mindset to secure the Web3 ecosystem. Arbitrary Execution has performed over 45 audits of Web3 protocols and projects, created tools that continuously monitor the blockchain for anomalous activity, and launched the Web3 SDLC, a framework for integrating security throughout the development life cycle.

Since 2017, Verichains has been a pioneer and one of the leading blockchain security firms in APAC, with extensive expertise in security, cryptography, and core blockchain technology. More than 200 clients trust them with $50 billion assets under protection, including several high-profile clients such as BNB Chain, Klaytn, Wemix, Line Corp, Axie Infinity, Ronin Network, and Kyber Network.Verichains provides blockchain security services such as blockchain protocol and smart contract security audit, mobile application protection, key management solution, on-chain risk monitoring, and red team/penetration testing services.Their world-class security team has found several vulnerabilities in layer-1 protocol, bridge, and smart contracts in the last five years. They helped investigate and fix security issues in the two largest global crypto hacks: BNB Bridge (Binance) and Ronin Bridge (Sky Mavis).

Syndica is building the cloud of Web3, providing enterprise-grade infrastructure, which includes specialized indexing APIs, RPC infrastructure, ChainStream API (streaming on-chain events), and more. Syndica makes it easy to get on-chain data into your application environment through their battle-tested RPC infrastructure as well as specialized APIs such as the ChainStream API. This allows you to get real-time notifications of on-chain events enabling your application to quickly and reliably react to them.

SharkTeam is the world’s leading Web3 security service provider. It offers smart contract audit, chain analytics, and emergency response services.SharkTeam’s vision is to comprehensively protect the security of the Web3 world. The team is composed of experienced security professionals and senior researchers from all over the world. They are proficient in the underlying theory of blockchain and smart contracts.

The first thing any beginner Web3 developer needs is a high-quality connection to the blockchain. Ankr offers high-performance RPC API connections to 30+ blockchains with advanced tools and services that builders can use to take their projects to the next level. With high-performance node infrastructure distributed across the globe, Ankr powers decentralized applications for the fastest, most reliable experience possible.

Cyberscope is a leading blockchain security firm specializing in smart contract audits, KYC services, and AML analytics. With over two years of experience, Cyberscope has established itself as a trusted partner with all major launchpads and reputable entities such as CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, Polygon Village, and Techstars.

Launched in 2021, Star Atlas is a futuristic space-themed strategy game built onSolana. Players collect, create and trade non-fungible tokens (NFTs) thatrepresent in-game items within the Star Atlas metaverse. Similar to other Web3 games, Star Atlas players have complete control over theirvirtual environment. They choose to build entire cities or form DAOs to governcertain regions. Players receive ATLAS, the in-game currency, as rewards.

Snowflake is multisig platform wallet on Solana. Their wallet allows teams toschedule payroll, recurring payments and future payments, and see fiat values ofyour assets and portfolio balance in real-time. The platform can also require multiple team members to confirm every transactionin order to execute it, which helps prevent unauthorized access to companycrypto.

Solend is a DeFi protocol that allows for lending and borrowing on the SolanaChain allowing users to earn interest on deposits. With Solend, Borrowers canleverage long and short crypto assets. The protocol boasts cheap transactionfees and high throughput which make it a preferred DeFi platform and allowsusers to earn interest and borrow up to 16 assets on more than 40 pools. Solendalso has a governance token (SLND), which allows users to buy into theprotocol.

Founded in 2021, Soldex is a trustless decentralized trading protocol on Solana,headquartered in Halifax, Canada.Soldex uses Artificial Intelligence coupled with Machine Learning to solve somepeculiar real-time cross-exchange problems.It has a lot customizable of bots to enhance the trading experience of itsusers. These AIs will help the users to make more well-informed tradingdecisions.Users can farm, stake, swap, and even create liquidity pools on Soldex.

Jet Protocol leverages the speed of Solana to allow for efficient trading, tightcollateral ratios, and dynamic pricing for its users. Their governance token(JET) ensures decentralized consensus and security. Features of the protocol include cross-chain modules for equalization ofinterest rates, leveraged borrowing automated position management, secondarymarkets for interest rate speculation, and liquidity provisioning for senior andjunior debt positions.

Sonar Watch is a dashboard for Solana. Users can access an overview of a walletor public address on the Solana Blockchain, and view the history as well ascrucial metics of a user's portfolio within a page. Developers can request foran API key to integrate data end-points into their programs.

Founded by three full-stack engineers with strong big data backgrounds,Chaincrunch is the go-to platform for Solana on-chain analytics Users can utilize Chaincrunch’s APIs, dashboards, realtime metrics, andnotebooks to analyze projects on the Solona blockchain. The team is constantly adding new features and iterating on their product tomake it the best experience possible for users.

Atrix is one of the fast-rising Automated Market Makers on the Solana blockchainthat boasts over $30 million in liquidity and almost 200 vaults.Users can access swapping, staking, and contribution to liquidity pools as wellas interfacing the Serum decentralized exchange via Atrix.Developers can integrate Atrix into projects for swapping on and addingliquidity to Serum, and interacting with farms.It supports and is in partnership with several Solana protocols including Mango,Bonfida, and Slope.

Step is a Portfolio Manager dashboard with the largest coverage of the Solanaecosystem and a growing Data Analytics suite across DeFi and NFTs. Users canvisualise their portfolio and view aggregations of all LPs, tokens, farms, andpositions that a user may have associated with their wallet and see it alldisplayed on a seamless dashboard. Developers can also use the site to viewtheir portfolio.

01 is an Alameda-backed and Serum-based decentralized exchange protocol onSolana .01 gives users a comprehensive trading experience since it has a lot of featuresthat are particular to centralized exchanges such as cross-margin and futurestrading, unlike most other decentralized exchanges.For the developers, 01 has a robust software development kit in variouslanguages, including Rust, Typescript, and and Python for faster development.

Tulip protocol runs on the Solana blockchain and offers 3 major yield productscalled Vault, Lending, and Leveraged farming.Tulip's Vault strategies consistently compound with time, thanks to Solana's lowtransaction costs and high speed.Through its highly secure services, Tulip protocol offers numerous benefits to'farmers' such as higher yield APY, and smaller gas fees.

Oxygen is a DeFi prime brokerage service built on Solana and powered by Serum'son-chain infrastructure. Users can manage capital by using the same collateralmultiple times, access cross-collateralization and market-based pricing.Developers can use the API for defi programmes. The protocol is scalable anddemocratizes borrowing, lending, and trading with leverage.

HXRO is a simplified first-class option trading platform.Users can trade bitcoin, ethereum, solana option contracts, make use of HXRO'sthree-tiered options armed traders that is sophisted enough to secure a higherchance of making protifable trades, as well as use the in-built de-riskingtrading bots to receive guidance on making more-informed trading decisions.As a multi-chain platform, its users can trade a wide array of crypto fromSolana to ETH, and even Bitcoin.

Lifinity is a special market maker that does not rely on arbitragers for theprices of assets but instead relies on Pyth - a Web3 decentralized oracle.Users are shielded from avoidable impermanent loss and receive fees that are setmanually.Lifinity maintains its market asset equilibrium by favouring trades and priceactions that balance its liquidity pool.

Muse is a web3 platform for publishing comic books, graphic novels, andanimations. Users can get access to independently created content and communicate directlywith creators and share with their friends. Content creators can publish and monetize their comics, novels, and animationswithout the need for a middle man. While still in beta, the product hopes to democratize the comic book publishingworld by giving power back to creators and users.

GameFi platform, Arcade, offers the opportunity for meaningful rewards fromplay-to-earn games in the metaverse without direct gameplay or ownership ofin-game NFTs. Arcade has developed what they call mission pools to distribute rewards tomembers by leveraging their ownership of games, in-game NFTs, and strategicconnections to guilds, gamers, contributors, and game developers.

Aldrin is a decentralized exchange on the Solana network that aims to simplifythe decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem for all levels of users. It launchedan automated market maker (AMM) DEX to facilitate instant token swaps with thehelp of liquidity pools in October 2021.Previously known as Cryptocurrencies.ai, Aldrin offers crypto spot and futurestrading on its DEX, along with the opportunity for earning passive incomethrough its liquidity pools.

The Parrot Protocol is a Solana non-custodial lending defi and liquiditynetwork. Users can access their stablecoin, PAI, and the non-custodial lendingmarket to access value in LP tokens, and the lending network collateralized byLP tokens. Developers can view statistics available on the site.

Solrise Finance is a decentralized asset management and investment platformbuilt on Solana. The protocol enables anyone to invest in crypto assets groupedtogether in funds called Solrise funds, similar to hedge funds. The advantage of these funds is that they are managed by third-parties whosetrack records are verifiable on the blockchain and users can pick the ones thatsuit their risk appetite.

PsyOptions is a Solana blockchain-based options protocol. Because options arerepresented as SPL Tokens, they can be traded on any DEX that accepts them.PsyOptions V1 is 100% collateralized, asset settled, and supports covered callsand secured puts.PsyOptions gives DeFi a TradFi feel with its decentralized, permissionless, andcommunity-owned financial services platform. Their vision is to become the defacto on-chain financial services platform for DeFi users worldwide.

Friktion is a one-stop shop for full-stack portfolio management designed tooutperform market cycles.The platform offers Strategies for risk-adjusted returns for DAOs, individuals,and traditional institutions.Friktion's native portfolio strategies are volts. Volts are chosen by usersbased on their risk tolerance, deposit assets, and generate passive returns. Friktion allows users to create a portfolio that generates returns in bull,bear, and crab markets.

Crema Finance is an established concentrated liquidity protocol on the Solanablockchain with over $2 million TVL and increasing.Apart from its concentrated liquidity product, Crema Finance shares incentiveswith the liquidity providers to encourage more influx of locked funds.For wider accessibliity, Crema Finance has supports other popular blockchains tofacilitate cross-chain swapping.Developers can also tap intot the Crema Finance SDK to build their DApps wherethey can use Crema Finance as an oracle or infrastructures.

Launched on February 21, 2021, Raydium is a Solana-based automated market makerexchange and liquidity provider that powers the Solana DeFi ecosystem.Raydium shares liquidity with Serum, another Solana DEX, and has access to itscentral order book mechanism that mirrors traditional exchanges. This allows forsuper-fast, low-fee trading of digital assets on Solana while providing thereliability of an order book system.

Backed by the likes of Solana Ventures and Alameda Research, Saros Finance is atrail-blazing DeFi protocol built on the Solana blockchain.Users gain access to the protocol's 3 major products: SarosFarm, SarosStake, andSarosSwap. Each of the products as mentioned earlier were for automated marketmaking, staking, and swapping respectively.It also has a tool called SarosSnapshot that traders can use to trackcompetition.

At its core, Cope is a play-to-earn decentralized application on the Solanablockchain with a vibrant community of gamers.The community members can go higher on the leaderboard by giving accuratetrading calls for the community.Cope has a staking provision across the Solana network. The users have twostaking options; either they stake their COPE tokens in Solana-native liquiditypool protocols such as Raydium, or they stake in a Solana-native wallet such asSollet or Phantom - which is the most popular.

Quarry Protocol is an open protocol for initiating Solana liquidity miningprograms. Quarry was created with the goal of assisting other Solana projects inlaunching on-chain liquidity mining programs. While manually sending tokens to addresses is currently standard practice, itwould be much better for the growth of the ecosystem if liquidity miningprograms were composable and enforceable on-chain.

Larix is Solana's first Metaverse-based protocol that features a dynamicinterest rate model and more capital-efficient risk management pools. This means this protocol can securely use a wide range of collateral types,including crypto tokens, stablecoins, synthetic assets, NFTs, and other assets. Furthermore, the reward system, based on a carefully constructed token economy,enables continuous incentive allocation to increase demand.

Katana is the premier yield generation protocol. The Katana protocol is a set ofsmart contracts on Solana that provides the best suite of packaged yieldproducts, allowing users to passively access the ecosystem's best risk-adjustedyields.Katana is ideal for retail users, DAOs, institutions, protocols, and otherslooking to generate yield on their crypto assets. Anyone can choose to buildtheir own products, protocols, or experiences on top of the core Katana protocolas a base primitive.

Ratio was established in 2021 with initial seed capital raised from investorsincluding Alameda Research, CMS, and Solana Labs. For users, their Risk RatingAlgorithms help mitigate defi risks and offer yields on deposited LP even whileleveraging that deposited collateral.

Cega is developing the next generation of defi derivatives. It is the firstprotocol that is solely focused on exotic derivatives, a type of options productthat combines basic options (e.g. call/put) with advanced optionscharacteristics,Cega creates packaged offerings for investors that generate superior yield,provides downside protection, and expresses infinite views of the financialmarket.

Cropper Finance was founded in 2021 by Arthur C, Quentin Cropper, FabriceFabrice, and Victor Cropper in fulfillment of their plan to create aSolana-native Automated Market Maker.Leveraging the order book of Serum, Cropper Finance makes it possible for theusers or traders to farm various tokens and get yields.On the side of the projects, Cropper Finance gives a free-hand avenue to injectliquidity into their projects, decide the terms of their yields, and find aready yield-farming market.

Rust was developed in 2010 as a versatile language centered on the goal ofempowering developers. Developers using Rust can perform safe systems-leveloperations including memory management and parallelism. As a result, Rustencourages writing extremely fast programs without having to compromisesecurity. In addition to being the main language for writing fast Solana smartcontracts, Rust is used for programming with Polkadot, Elrond, NEAR, and Zcash.

Created by Staking Facilities and VGNG, Solanabeach is a comprehensive blockexplorer to view core Solana statistics. Users can explore the network'sstatistics, validators, and token metrics. Developers can use the testnet ordevnet views as well as delegate information to the Solana Beach Validator.

Francium is one of Solana's largest Defi platforms for yield generation. Francium goes beyond the traditional lending and borrowing of DeFi and offersusers profit-generating yield strategies tailored to their specific needs.In other words, it assists users in locating crypto assets with the highestyields so they can properly channel funds.It also connects developers and users in a decentralized manner. As a result,developers are free to create products that users may find useful.

Twetch is a social media app for all platforms that runs on Solana and usesblockchain to ensure data privacy and decentralization, while also enabling anative NFT marketplace. It is completely on-chain; every Twetch account is a crypto wallet. Everyinteraction is a transaction that is archived and stored on the blockchain.

The Binary Ninja eBPF implements a Capstone-powered disassembler and lifter forthe Solana bytecode format. Developers can use this open source protocol to disassemble raw byte code intohuman readable code in solidity-like format. The GitHub page has easy to follow instructions for implementing the protocol.

Superteam collects and offers bounties to contributors to work on developingupcoming projects on Solana. In exchange for producing high-quality content, software, and more, SuperteamDAOoffers rewards to its contributors. If you're a dev who is looking to join a squad of high-functioning Solanadevelopers, you should check out SuperteamDAO.

Underdog is a  gasless API to create dynamic/soulbound NFTs, manage NFTs, and connect off-chain workflows, on-chain. Users can manage, integrate, and create NFTs with their favorite web2 tools like Zapier, Discord, Telegram, Notion, etc. Use Underdog powered NFTs to dynamically capture user or member activity and engagement in one-place. We are trusted by SuperteamDAO, Parcl, and Dispatch Forums.

Solang is an open source solidity compiler for Solana and substrate developers.Users and developers can utilize this open source project to compile their codeand interact with the underlying blockchains. Developed by a team of 25 contributors, Solang is the go-to compiler for solanaand substrate.

Deployed on the Solana blockchain, Orca is a decentralized exchange with asimplified and beginner-friendly user interface. On Orca, users trade theirfavorite SPL tokens with minimal slippage and near-instant transaction finality.Orca offers incentivized trading pools that reward liquidity providers withgenerous emissions. By providing SOL and stSOL tokens to a liquidity pool, yieldfarmers can earn passive income by collecting trading fees while being protectedfrom impermanent loss.

Apricot is a next-generation lending protocol built on Solana that enablesleveraged yield farming. Their sole mission is to assist users in maximizing their yield while mitigatingrisk at the same time.Apricot allows users to:-Deposit assets to earn interest (Apricot Lend)-Borrow assets for trading or yield farming (Apricot Cross-Farm)-Configure when and how automated deleveraging occurs (Apricot Assist)

Fully community owned and operated, Yield Guild Games is a collective of likeminded crypto gaming and NFT investors. Within the Yield Guild Games DAO,members can rent a wide variety of NFTs used in popular blockchain-based gameslike Axie Infinity, Sandbox and Splinterlands.The aim of the Yield Guild Games project is to give crypto gamers greaterinvestment exposure to the industry while lowering the barrier to entry forenthusiasts.

Socean is a Solana liquid staking platform which promises risk-free annualpercentage yield of up to 6.34% on SOL tokens. Socean makes SOL staking liquid —when users stake SOL, they receive scnSOL tokens which can be used across theSolana ecosystem. The scnSOL tokens also appreciates in value as the Soceanstaking pool accrues staking rewards. Socean users can unstake their tokens andexchange scnSOL for SOL at any time. Socean also provides Streams, which helps protocols sell governance tokens withvesting periods, enabling them to control inflation rate. The platform offerssoftware development kits to help developers integrate Socean with otherapplications.

Founded in 2021, Solscan is a data analytics platform that provides a searchfunction for information on the Solana blockchain. Users can view activity onthe Solana blockchain, manage their accounts, track transactions, and search forinvestment opportunities within the ecosystem. Developers can integrateSolscan's API in dapps. Solscan has an informative platform accompanied by anNFT and DeFi dashboard.

One of the leading decentralized exchanges built on the Solana network, Serumrecreates the familiar trading environment of a centralized exchange with itssimplified and convenient interface.  Leveraging Solana’s unmatched transactionthroughput and low gas fees, users can trade SLP tokens on-chain withnear-instant finality.Serum offers deep liquidity and tight spreads to mitigate trade slippage andensure traders receive maximum value for their trades.

Media Network is a content delivery network that hopes to provide a marketplacefor decentralized, peer-to-peer bandwidth. Users can utilize Media Networks services to hire bandwidth-on-demand, from anetwork of decentralized providers. Developers can earn $MEDIA rewards for contributing their bandwidth to thenetwork. The protocol allows network participants to serve content without introducingtrust assumptions or pre-authentication requirements.

@graph.headline: Metana - Web3 bootcamp - Web3 Education Resources

acceptedAnswer.text: Metana offers self-paced, online Web3 bootcamps covering Solidity (24 weeks) and Rust (24 weeks). The bootcamps are project-based and students will finish the course with a portfolio to show to potential employers. The Solidity bootcamp covers topics like Solidity, DeFi, smart contracts, wallets, Ethereum, NFTs, OpenSea, staking, gas and gas fees, zero-knowledge proofs, and layer 2. The Rust bootcamp covers topics like Rust, dapps, smart contracts, DeFi, GraphQL, and the Anchor framework.

Launched in 2020 by founder and CEO Norbert Bodziony, Synthetify is an intuitiveprotocol for managing synthetic assets on the Solana blockchain. UsingSynthetify, Solana natives can produce SPL tokens pegged to the price of theircorresponding traditional asset. In doing so, ‘real-world’ assets can berepresented and used within other DeFi protocols within the Solana ecosystem.Synthetify is fully decentralized, non custodial and can be accessed from anydevice.

Drift is one of the top-in-the-news trading protocol on the Solana blockchain,as it has a lot of incentives for its users.Traders gain up to 10x leverage opportunity in their trades due to the perpetualswaps, and users of Drift can also borrow and lend out blockchain-based assetsto earn rewards in return. Developers can use the SDK to develop bots or accesshistorical data.It also has built-in trading bots to help out traders.

Port Finance is a non-custodial money market protocol on Solana. Currently usershave access to variable interest rates based on supply & demand, crosscollateral lending, and flash loans. Their cross-collateral lending allows forup to 9 crypto assets used for 1 loan. The Port Finance governance token (PORT)allows for the community to vote on collateral ratio, new asset supports,liquidation threshold and other aspects of the platform.

Founded in 2016 by Jules Urbach, Render.x is a decentralized cloud-basedrendering service and marketplace. Users can leverage the power of idle GPUs across the globe to render their workat a fraction of the cost and speed of in-house rendering. Developers can earn $RNDR tokens by registering their idle GPUs on the network. An Ethereum-based network, artists can store their creations and work on thenetwork and full digital rights management.

Switchboard allows the SOL community to push any form of data on-chain. Theprotocol can be used in many ways such as determining the current price of anasset for collateralized lending, determining the state of a tracking number toauto settle funds on arrival, and determining the current standings of fantasysports rankings. Switchboard is also permissionless. From a developer's perspective, you canbuild and manage your own data feeds, all of which can be done fromSwitchboard's Publisher.

The Saber AMM aims to bring deep liquidity to the Solana blockchain and is the network’s answer to stablecoin swap sites like Curve. On Saber, users can instantly swap stablecoins and pegged assets through liquidity pools and take advantage of Solana’s fast transactions and micro gas fees.Saber users can also earn passive income by providing liquidity to stablecoin pairs and collecting a percentage of trading fees collected by pools.

Hubble is a decentralized lending protocol on Solana that allows users to borrowthe stablecoin USDH against their own assets, giving users some liquidity intheir long term holdings. Hubble also has a native token HBB which willeventually become the governance token when Hubble becomes a DAO. Hubble is unique as it charges a one-time 0.5% fee for minting and redeemingUSDH, instead of a long-term interest rate. Hubble is best characterized as aSolana-based version of MakerDAO.

Founded by Frostbyte, Penguin Finance is a treasury and liquidity protocol onSolana. It allows projects to purchase liquidity as bonds to stay afloat and diversifytreasuries even during bearish markets. Penguin Finance also encourage loyal community members with staking rewards.With its integration with Jupiter, Penguin Finance leverages its router for itstrading pool.

Created by Ryan Endacott, the Solana Faucet is a simple tool that allows Solana developers to instantly receive SOL tokens on both the Solana Testnet and Devnet. With the click of a button, users can airdrop themselves an infinite amount of Testnet SOL tokens for free.These Testnet tokens can be used to interact with dApps on the Solana Testnet, or test smart contracts written for the Solana ecosystem without risking the potential loss of any real value.

Dexlab is a comprehensive platform for exploring decentralized finance on the Solana network. Dexlab is most commonly used as a token exchange platform where users can trade SPL tokens through the Dexlab order book.  The Dexlab platform also features a staking service that can be used to earn rewards and hosts private token sales through its intuitive launchpad. Dexlab users can even create their own SPL tokens and NFTs using the Dexlab minting platform.

Star Atlas DAO establishes a community-driven approach to the governance of theStar Atlas ecosystem as users are encouraged to vote on developmentalproposals.  The voting weight of each user is closely linked to the amount of the platform'sgovernance token, POLIS, they own and their commitments to the well-being of theStar Atlas ecosystem. Users have to stake POLIS to become eligible to partake in on-chain governance.At the time of writing, Star Atlas DAO has over 40,000+ members.

Swim is one of the few bridges that are connecting the Solana DeFi ecosystem with the other blockchains. With Swim, there is no need to initially wrap assets before transacting them across chains as they can be sent natively. The protocol ensures DeFi interoperability from Solana-based assets to other blockchain networks.

Zeta is a Solana blockchain-based decentralized derivatives trading protocol. Itprovides liquid, non-custodial, and under-collateralized derivatives trading.Through its decentralized exchange (DEX), the protocol allows users to placesuper-fast orders and bet on the future price of crypto assets, and it bringstrading tools found in traditional markets, such as forex and stocks, to theblockchain environment.

@graph.headline: Mercurial Finance - DeFi Yield Farming Platforms

acceptedAnswer.text: Mercurial Finance is a stablecoin-focused Automated Market maker on the Solanablockchain that aims to build DeFi's first dynamic vaults for stable assets.Such dynamic vaults will help in achieving low slippage swaps for stables, whilealso improving LP profits with dynamic fees and flexible capital allocation.Mercurial also encompasses a suite of technical tools that help users to easilydeposit and create stable assets.

Meta Blocks, a platform founded by Sarthak Khurana, enables developers to buildNFT applications and create upgradeable NFTs that decay over time. By combininga base NFT into the Solana-hosted smart contract, along with other componentNFTs, users can create a meta NFT with new traits or new skins, for example,making it useful for games. Each time a user deposits or withdraws an NFT fromthe smart contract, the metadata of the meta NFT is modified to reflect all thecomponent NFTs.

Launched in December 2021 by Justin Kan, Robin Chan and David Wurtz, Fractal isa marketplace for gaming NFTs. On Fractal, users can discover, buy directly fromgame sellers and resell NFT games. Developers can list NFT drops for durablein-game assets and sell directly to players. Game developers can make gamingNFTs available for buyers even before a game is launched.

Founded in 2020 by Alex Salnikov, Rarible is an Ethereum-based platform forcreating, selling and buying NFTs. Users can acquire crypto assets on Rarible.Developers can use Rarible Multichain Protocol to mint NFTs, create sell ordersand bids as well as purchase an NFT. The platform has a large base of 1.6million users and a venture capital of $16 million.

Solvent is an early liquidity platform for NFTs on Solana. The platform letsusers convert their NFTs by depositing them into a NFT collection on Solvent(bucket). This mints tokens called droplets which can be used for lending,fractionalized ownership of NFTs and gaining passive income. Solvent usesAMM-based floor prices and calculates collateralized loans based on this.

Launched by NftEyez Lab, NftEyez is first NFT Gallery on Solana, and remains oneof the most popular NFT galleries. Users can connect their wallets, viewupcoming projects and influencers in NFT ecosystems. Developers can access theproject's GitHub to use services for simplifying parsing NFTs on Solana andbuild NFT galleries.

Switzerland-based JPool lets users stake SOL and participate in the consensusmechanism of the Solana network for rewards. When users stake SOL via JPool tobecome delegators, they receive the JSOL token, which represents their ownershipin the pool and grows as it accrues staking rewards. JSOL can also be used as aDeFi instrument for liquidity mining. Delegators can earn staking rewards of upto 6.5-8% annuallyJPool distributes SOL staked by delegators among all validators to maximizerewards and keep the network decentralized. It uses the Stake Pool concept,which increases stake distribution among validators to strengthendecentralization.

DigitalEyes Market is a Solana NFT and Sol marketplace. DigitalEyes allows usersto view, search, filter and trade NFTs on Solana. Developers can apply to launchcollections and download their mint hash list. As of October 22 2022,DigitalEyes has over 71k traders on its platform and a trading volume of over$127m.

The Goki Smart Wallet is a programmable multisig wallet. The wallets offer twotypes of subaccounts: derived accounts and owner-invoker accounts. Derivedaccounts require approval from the owner to sign off on transactions.Owner-invoker accounts allow members to sign off without such approval. Userscan define wallet owners upfront as well as edit them in the future.

Solport is a marketplace for Solana NFT trading. Users can view NFTs using thescarcity filters, participate in user auctions and receive notifications ofmarketplace activity via Discord or Telegram. Developers can list collections onSolport. Solport charges a 2% fee for sellers on the platform and does notcharge fees for listing, unlisting, or refunding offers.

SoCool is a Decentralized Autonomous Organization in infrastructure and a walletfor a creator economy. Users gain access to the SoCool wallet to store, buy,send, receive, swap tokens and collect NFTs cross-chain as well as the abilityto mint tokens and participate in DAO voting. Developers can use the financialtools on SoCool and participate in these communities.

Solaland offers several products to streamline the process of managing an NFTcommunity. They offer a verification bot that allows NFT communities to provideexclusive access and privileges to users based on their wallet holdings. They also offer a sales bot, which broadcasts the sales performance of an NFT tothe community. Solaland also offers a listing bot, which tracks NFT transactions on secondarymarkets. Finally, they offer an airdrop community that allows creators to airdrop NFTs.

Matrica offers features to both users and communities. Through Matrica, userscan get auto-verification on over 1500 Discord servers, add multiple hardwareand software wallets, detect staked and listed NFTs, and vote on on-chainproposals using NFTs. For communities and NFT creators, Matrica allows creators to see their entirecollection, including current marketplace listings, and NFT statuses, and helpthem work more easily on Discord, offering hierarchies, bot notifications, andmore.

Launched in 2022, Aurory is a free blockchain-based tactical Japaneserole-playing game built on Solana. It follows the play-to-earn model where userscan compete with other players using creatures called ‘Nefties,’ each of whichis a non-fungible token (NFT). ‘Nefties’ can be hatched, evolved, battled withand traded. Aurory players earn the AURY token through staking, trading Nefties, and otherin-game items. These tokens can then be exchanged for fiat or othercryptocurrencies.

Launched in 2021, Rarity Sniper is a platform used to help locate the rarestNFTs in a collection. Users can view new collections, drops and access NFT newsand stats. Developers can use it to explore collections and view stats. RaritySniper initially helped the founder find some extremely rare NFTs from Bored ApeKennel Club, Cool Cats, and other drops

Sol Sniper is an analytics and trading tool on Solana. Users can identifytrending collections and popular searches with statistics provided on NFT floorprices and sales volume over various time frames, or use the terminal mode ifthey are trading. Developers can use the data and statistics provided by SolSniper.

Coral Cube is a Solana-based NFT aggregator platform which has teamed up withMagic Eden as of October 2022. Coral Cube users can buy, sell and view NFTsacross marketplaces. Developers can view statistics and transactions on theplatform. Coral Cube offers optional creator fees and is a fast platform.

The Bridgesplit platform aims to bring interoperability between NFT projects,derivative markets, and decentralized finance. Through a collection of novelAPIs, Bridgesplit reimagines NFT trading on the Solana blockchain allowing usersto put their NFTs up as collateral and borrow against those assets orfractionalize NFT purchases.With funding from reputable investors like Jump Capital and Coinbase ventures,Bridgesplit APIs are expected to become an integral part of the Solana NFTecosystem.

Novel is an all-in-one NFT tool that helps its NFT holders build no-codeeCommerce stores, founded in October 2021 by Anna Merzi, Brian Sugar, RogerBeaman. With Novel, users can create token-gated stores, create an NFT collection withinminutes, sell NFTs on Shopify, and offer token-gated benefits to customers.Developers can use Novel's API to bring token-gating features to theirapplications with a single line of code.

Backed by investors like the Solana Foundation and FTX, DeFi Land is ablockchain-based version of Facebook’s agriculture-simulation game Farmville. Itfollows the play-to-earn model, allowing users to earn the native token DFL forcompleting tasks and reaching milestones. DeFi Land players can interact with automated market makers, decentralizedexchanges as well as lending and borrowing protocols — all within the game.

Founded in 2021 by Alex Kehaya, Holaplex is an NFT marketplace. Users can usethe simple and free tools to create and sell NFTs. Developers can use theHolaplex API to integrate endpoints within their programmes or make their web3applications run faster with Holaplex's indexer API. Holaplex offers a varietyof features, including drops, insights and NFT management.

Founded in 2021, SolanaFloor is a data analysis platform for Solana. Users canaccess on-chain information about token distribution, price development, and NFTdata. Developers can use SolanaFloor pro to access more data and insights orregister a .sol domain to use the Solana name domain service.

Grapes is essentially a community booster, manager, and content creator. Theyoffer marketing and branding services, development, and insights into how to setup DAOs. Their services are broken down into two packages, New NFT Project and New DefiProject. Their Defi project package offers event planning and Discord moderationservices, while their NFT project package offers mint analysis, art/story/traitconsulting, and more.

Launched in February 2022 by Katherine Liu and Matt Lim, Formfunction is aSolana NFT marketplace. Users can explore and collect NFTs and view work byindependent artists. Developers can view creator stats, and use feature requestson the platform. Formfunction has paid artists more than $1 million since itslaunch.

Launched in 2021 and founded by SOLBigBrain, HowRare.is shows how rare a SolanaNFT is. Users can find all the NFT collections along with their parameters suchas floor price, items, holders, on sale, % on sale, and floor MC (USD) on themain page. Developers can use the API to use data endpoints from HowRare.isregarding collections, drops, rarity and others.

Bonfida is a product suite that provides a user-friendly front-end experiencefor Serum and Solana. Users can use the suite of products inclluding bots anddomain names, view charts and execute market orders. Developers can useBonfida's API for various purposes including accessing a unique repository ofall Serum transactions and build on-chain trading bots.

Founded in 2021, Jito Labs is the first-of-its-kind MEV infrastructure companythat is building high-performance systems aimed at scaling Solana, andmaximizing staker and validator rewards. Jito Labs is making MEV more democraticand accessible to the trading community and Solana validators.Solana validators can use Jito-Solana Client, Jito Block Engine, and JitoRelayer, to better utilize hardware, build more profitable blocks, outsourcespam mitigation, and maximize their revenues.

Blockasset is an NFT and token ecosystem. Users can interact with fans orathletes via athlete tokens, purchasing, staking or selling NFTs, as well asaccess exclusive fanclubs and curated content. Blockasset allows fans tointeract with athletes and other super-fans directly, without including sportingorganisations.

Nina is a new platform for publishing, streaming, and purchasing music.Nina charges artists a small fee per upload that covers the permanent storage oftheir work. Their releases are made available to the public for streaming andpurchase as tokenized assets with quantities and prices set by the artists. Ninapays artists 100% of primary sales and a percentage of secondary-market sales oftheir choice.

DeQuest is a gaming platform on major blockchains such as Ethereum and Solana.It rewards people for participating and being active players in its selectedgames.The homepage of DeQuest features many action games that the users can selectfrom and start playing.DeQuest supports most popular game brands in Web3 and Web2, includingDecentraland, Synergy Land, and Skyweaver.

Audius is a decentralized music streaming protocol based on Solana. Audiusaddresses the inefficiencies of the music industry, exacerbated by opaque musicrights ownership and intermediaries standing between artists and theiraudiences.Audius' platform, powered by its native AUDIO token, aims to align the interestsof artists, fans, and node operators. Artists can upload music that is storedand distributed by content and discovery nodes that fans can listen to forfree.

Launched in 2021, Solanart is a Solana-based open NFT marketplace that runs onthe Solana blockchain. Users can acquire or sell Solana-based NFTs by connectingwith their Sollet Wallet, Sollet Chrome extension or Phantom. Developers canapply for a listing or a launchpad. Solanart is a zero-fee NFT tradingplatform.

The GenesysGo project was founded in February 2021 by Frank Mathais. Offering acomprehensive range of services including validator node operation, RPCmaintenance and storage solutions, GenesysGo is a go-to provider for networkservices on the Solana blockchain. GenesysGo allows developers to benefit from fast and reliable communicationbetween their applications and the Solana blockchain. By using GenesysGo,developers can bypass public RPC servers which are prone to congestion anddowntime. GenesysGO RPC endpoints are available all over the world and can beconfigured in just 15 minutes, making them a popular choice for developers.

The Tiexo marketplace displays NFT collections within the Solana ecosystem andwas launched in 2021. Tiexo allows users to explore over 14 million NFTs, liston multiple marketplaces and buy and stake NFTs. Developers can view real timestatistics on the platform or use the node operator for their programs.

Alpha.art is an NFT marketplace for Solana-based NFTs. Users can connect theirwallets, browse, make offers and trade Solana NFTs on alpha.art, as well as earnSolana on alpha.art by owning and staking Piggy Sol Gang NFTs. Developers canmake listing requests. Alpha.art does not charge listing fees.

STEPN, the world’s first move-to-earn game, was launched in late 2021 byFindSatoshi Lab. Running on Ethereum’s biggest competitor Solana, STEPN has lowgas fees and carbon footprint. Players can try the game mechanics for free, but to start earning native tokensGST and GMT, one must buy NFT sneakers with varying stats determining theirvalue. The more one moves, the more they earn. Sneakers can also be traded onNFT marketplaces.

Solswatch offers insights and charts for Solana NFT collections. Users can viewthe latest floor prices, volume & listing history on NFTs as well as discovernew collections as soon as they are added to the marketplaces. Developers canuse the Solswatch public API to integrate end points into their programmes.Right now, SolsWatch supports the following 9 marketplaces with plans to supportmore marketplaces.

MoonRank is a statistical rarity service for the Solana NFT ecosystem. Users canview the rarity of NFTs and explore new collections in realtime with no manualinput of necessary for the ranking. Developers can also access the statistics.Moonrank ranks every NFT collection on a mathematical basis.

Started in November 2021, SolRarity.App Website is a popular Solana-based NFTranking and rarity checking platforms. Users can view rarity rankings for allcollections on Solana. Developers can use the Rarity Sniper to see live listingsfrom different Solana marketplaces in one place. Holders of Rarikey get accessto exclusive SolRarity NFT products and tools.

Launched in August 2021, SolSea is an open NFT marketplace on the Solanablockchain. Users can buy or sell NFTs with embedded licenses, view rarity ranksof collections and connect wallets for trading NFTs. Developers can viewreal-time analytics from the on-chain data. Solsea offers airdrops for upcomingprojects.

Launched in 2021, Scour is a Solana NFT blockchain explorer. Users can use it totrack sales, listings, price drops, and bids on individual collections as wellas access statistics and connect their wallets. Developers can use it to trackdata on NFTs. Scour has been used to identify individual collections and userscan track their performance by filtering NFT collections according to severalcriteria.

The Frakt protocol allows its users to make their NFTs liquid by using them forcollateral on loans. Users can get $SOL and $USDC liquidity using their NFTs orpool tokens as collateral. They have both perpetual (dynamic interest) and fliploans (fixed interest for a short duration). Peer-to-pool lending lets usersearn interest on their $SOL, which can be swapped for $USDC. Their “InitialLiquidity Offering” (ILO) solution also ensures post-mint liquidity, whichprevents rugs.

Moonly is a service that provides advanced tools to help users make informeddecisions about their NFT investments. Users can check NFT Stats by mint price,supply, floor price, volume, Twitter and Discord Engagement, and price changes.Developers can access live market data. They offer a suite of free tools forusers and are currently buiding premium tools which will be available to holdersof their NFT.

Launched in 2017, BitDegree is an online educational platform that connectseducators, learners, and employers and focuses on teaching digital, business,and workplace skills. Users can use BitDegree for courses on programminglanguages, software, web design, digital marketing, productivity and timemanagement. Developers can also use BitDegree to improve their knowledge.

LunarCrush provides social intelligence to the cryptocurrency industry. There isa vast amount of information to keep up with, ranging from bitcoin to thousandsof other altcoins. As an investor, staying on top of this can be difficult.LunarCrush filters out the noise in the cryptocurrency world by listening toeverything that happens and distilling it into easily digestible bite-sizedchunks.

Coinalyze is a free, independently owned website committed to assisting thecryptocurrency trading community by providing unique research and analyticaltools that provide current data to assist you in making informed tradingdecisions.Users can find helpful features including Futures Markets Data: Open Interest,Funding Rate, and Liquidations.The platform has hundreds of the top cryptocurrencies available for viewing.

DeFi Rate is an independent research outlet that provides top-tier informationon all of the legitimate companies across the Web3 industry. Users can read and compare hundreds of DeFi protocols and Web3 applications tofind exactly what they're looking for and how it can be useful to them. DeFi Rate has over 3 million readers to date and is a trusted platform foraccurate web3 information.

Coin Particle is a data visualization platform that displays cryptocurrenciesbased on volatility. Users can utilize their dashboard to easily identify which currency’s have hadthe largest movements in a given time period. The cryptocurrencies are displayed as bubbles, with the largest bubblesrepresenting the highest volatility and the smallest representing the least. The platform has an IOS and Android app and can be changed to view differentcoin categories over different periods.

CertiK is a blockchain security technology company at the forefront of researchand development. CertiK is a pioneer in blockchain security, employingcutting-edge Formal Verification technology on smart contracts and blockchains.It protects and monitors blockchain protocols and smart contracts by leveragingbest-in-class artificial intelligence (AI) technology. CertiK was founded in2018 by professors from Yale University and Columbia University with the goal ofsecuring the web3 world.

Quantstamp is a blockchain security company that has performed over 250 auditsand secured over $200 billion in value.Their mission is to make blockchain technology more widely available byproviding security and risk assessment services.Quantstamp's services include securing Layer 1 blockchains like Ethereum 2.0 andSolana, as well as smart contract-powered NFT and DeFi applications like Makerand OpenSea.

Coin Metrics is the leading provider of crypto financial intelligence, providingnetwork data, market data, index and network risk solutions to the mostprestigious institutions touching cryptoassets.Users can use CoinMetrics data analytics platform to do industry research. Developers can use CoinMetrics APIs to build their own web3 analyticsapplications.  CoinMetrics was founded in 2017 as an open-source project to determine theeconomic significance of public blockchains.

Token Metrics is an AI-driven crypto research platform which turns data intoactionable investment insights.Users can get easily digestible analytics information about their favoritecryptocurrency projects and discover the best performing assets in certaincatagorys. Developers can use Token Metrics APIs to integrate top tier analytics into theirdapps. Token Metrics analytics platform features a Bull vs. Bear indicator that can beextremely helpful for gauging the general interest of an asset. With 90,000 community members, 5000 users, and 50+ countries, Token Metrics isconsidered the best platform to get web3 analytics.

With APY.vision users can track their liquidity pool gains and impermanent lossand get the data they need to know, such as when to enter and exit liquiditypools for maximum returns.Users benefit from APY.vision’s easily understandable user interface and canaccess pro features by holding APY.vision's community token, $VISION. With several high-profile partnerships, APY.vision has an all-encompassingsnapshot of the Web3 investing landscape.

DAO Lens offers several services to make onboarding and contribution management seamless for DAO community managers. Starting with DaoLens, which offers personalized onboarding, which means efficient information distribution and higher community engagement. Additionally, DaoLens allows DAOs to keep track of the scope and scale of different members' contributions, allowing them to delegate rewards accordingly. Finally, DaoLens offers services such as task-based token-gating, proposals and voting, treasury management, and Discord verification.

Allbridge Core enables the transfer of value between blockchains by offering cross-chain swaps of native stablecoins. Being messaging protocol agnostic, Allbridge Core connects a variety of EVM and non-EVM networks.

Founded in 2020 by Jaemin Jin and Arthur Jen, who later started the Magic Labsteam, Magic is a California-based blockchain company and a developer toolkit.Magic provides a friendlier user experience for Web3 products. The users nolonger need to download any wallet or store private keys.Instead, they can signup with their emails or Google. Apart from that, Magicmakes it possible to buy crypto and NFT with fiat with its in-built on-rampinfrastructure.

Copper is an institutional cryptocurrency custody and brokerage platformregistered in the United Kingdom and Wales. Its software platform is linked towell-known cryptocurrency exchanges such as Bitfinex, BitMEX, and Binance. Copper employs a method of storing and transferring digital assets known as"Walled Garden," which combines cryptography, cold wallets, physicaltransferrence, and personal validation by authorized human system operators.

Picket API supports over 170 wallets and over 100 languages. With a single click, users can authenticate their wallets, linking their walletsto DApps or using it to gate tokens.The Picket team provides intuitive resources and API products for developers tosimply authenticate the security of any wallet their users want to interactwith.

Many investors, including a16z and Solana, back Dynamic due to its applaudablemarket-driven product offerings.Dynamic offers APIs, SDKs, and dashboards for developers to use and in turn,manage users as well.The React library of Dynamic automatically detects the wallets that areinstalled on a machine and customizes those wallets to the brand identity of theproject a developer is building.

Disco is chain agnostic and uses decentralized identifiers and verifiedcredentials to help users take back their data ownership. Disco groups together personalized data that users then can selectively sharewith verifiers (institutions, social media accounts, etc).  The stronger auser's profile the better, as a strong profile helps secure trust with otherpeople, communities, and services.

Galxe is building a credential data network that is open to all developers inWeb3. This infrastructure addresses the needs of both on-chain and off-chaincommunities, empowering them to curate and contribute digital credentials to thenetwork.  For off-chain credentials, Galxe integrates data sources from many orgs,including Snapshot, Twitter, and GitHub. For on-chain credentials, subgraphqueries or static snapshots are used.

Pyth Network is an oracle that publishes financial market data to multipleblockchains. Various exchanges and market making firms contribute to theiravailable market data. The oracle continuously aggregates publishes prices toprovide accurate price feeds for a number of different asset types such as USequities, commodities, and cryptocurrencies.

DIA (Decentralised Information Asset) is a cross-chain, end-to-end, open-sourcedata and oracle platform for Web3. The platform allows developers to source andverify data from traditional and digital financial applications. The feedsprovide information such as asset prices, metaverse data, lending rates andmore.

@graph.headline: Orbis Club - Web3 Social Media Dapps

acceptedAnswer.text: Orbis Protocol is a set of social data models combined with a powerfuldecentralized infrastructure. Our advanced SDK and flexible modules make it easyto build fully composable, social experiences. For users, Orbis content isstored on a decentralized data network called Ceramic. This ensures that thedata shared by users is open and publicly accessible.

MEXC is a world-leading, user-friendly cryptocurrency exchange. Users can accessa range of services for trading spots, leveraged exchange-traded funds (ETFs),perpetual futures, NFT Index, portfolio management and many more.Developers can access MEXC's API to integrate data endpoints into their dapps.MEXC has over 7 million users across the globe.

Bithumb is a South Korean cryptocurrency exchange. Users can use Bithumb to buy,sell, trade, deposit and withdraw cryptocurrency. Developers can access the APIafter configuring an accessible IP to make withdrawals to their address via theAPI.

Founded in 2014 by Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, Gemini Trust Company, LLC is acryptocurrency exchange and custodian. Users can  buy, sell, and store digitalassets. Developers can access the Gemini API to retrieve information.Currently, it operates in many countries including United States, Canada, theUnited Kingdom, South Korea, Hong Kong, and Singapore.

Lanched in December 2020, Lido is the leading liquid staking platform thatenables users to earn interest on their cryptocurrencies across multipleblockchains.
